statements.insert:
select seq_BM_DELIVERY_id.nextval as I_INTID from dual
insert into BM_DELIVERY ( I_INTID ,C_TITLE ,C_SERVICENAME ,I_FIRSTREPORTERID ,I_REPORTERID ,I_APPROVERID ,D_OPTDATE ,I_STATUS ,I_DATAID ,C_REMARKS ,D_CREATETIME ,I_CREATEUSER ,D_UPDATETIME ,I_UPDATEUSER) values (#IntId#,#Title#,#ServiceName#,#FirstReporter.IntId#,#Reporter.IntId#,#Approver.IntId#,sysdate,#Status.DeliveryValue#,#DataId#,#Remarks#,sysdate,#CreateUser.IntId#,sysdate,#UpdateUser.IntId#)
statements.update: update BM_DELIVERY set I_REPORTERID = #Reporter.IntId# ,I_APPROVERID = #Approver.IntId# ,D_OPTDATE = sysdate ,I_STATUS = #Status.DeliveryValue# ,C_REMARKS = #Remarks# where I_INTID = #IntId#
statements.select: select a.I_INTID ,a.C_TITLE ,a.C_SERVICENAME ,a.I_FIRSTREPORTERID ,b.C_USERNICKNAME I_FIRSTREPORTERNAME ,a.I_REPORTERID ,c.C_USERNICKNAME I_REPORTERNAME ,a.I_APPROVERID ,d.C_USERNICKNAME I_APPROVERNAME ,a.D_OPTDATE ,a.I_STATUS ,a.I_DATAID ,a.C_REMARKS ,a.D_CREATETIME ,a.I_CREATEUSER ,f.C_USERNICKNAME I_CREATEUSERNAME ,a.D_UPDATETIME ,a.I_UPDATEUSER ,e.C_USERNICKNAME I_UPDATEUSERNAME from BM_DELIVERY a left join BM_USER b on a.I_FIRSTREPORTERID = b.I_INTID left join BM_USER c on a.I_REPORTERID = c.I_INTID left join BM_USER d on a.I_APPROVERID = d.I_INTID left join BM_USER f on a.I_CREATEUSER = f.I_INTID left join BM_USER e on a.I_UPDATEUSER = e.I_INTID where I_STATUS =#value# order by D_OPTDATE desc
